name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, particularly leveraging **TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, and **DevOps** methodologies. Proficient in modern frameworks such as **Express.js** and **NestJS**, with adeptness in database management using **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**. Skilled in creating robust **RESTful APIs** and **GraphQL** services to support scalable applications.
Experienced in integrating cutting-edge technologies, particularly in the development of AI/ML-driven solutions for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. Demonstrates expertise in building cloud-native applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, and reinforces system reliability through effective **microservices** architecture and **CI/CD** pipelines.
Familiar with compliance-driven practices that ensure adherence to industry standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS, and has a strong foundation in MLOps, specializing in model lifecycle management using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and maintained full-stack applications using **TypeScript**, **Python** (FastAPI), and **Node.js**, ensuring adherence to industry standards and best practices.
• Engineered RESTful and **GraphQL** APIs for enhanced system interactivity and data retrieval, focusing on performance and scalability.
• Implemented DevOps practices utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**, automating deployments and tests to improve development workflows and reduce downtime by **30%**.
• Designed database schemas and queries in **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **MySQL** to optimize data storage and retrieval, yielding performance improvements of up to **25%**.
• Collaborated in agile teams to deliver quality user experiences through **React** (17-18) and efficient state management solutions.
• Advised on the integration of **GenAI** technologies to enhance functionality and automate repetitive tasks within applications.
• Executed cloud-based deployments across various environments, ensuring reliable service delivery and minimal latency:
   - Developed solutions using **AWS** and **Azure** services, including serverless architectures with **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions** for enhanced operational efficiency.
• Conducted code reviews and established best practices, leading to a **40%** reduction in defect rates.
• Provided mentorship and guidance to junior engineers, fostering a collaborative team environment while promoting skill development in modern tech stack tools and libraries.
• Actively participated in cross-functional teams to gather requirements and provide effective end-to-end solutions that aligned with business goals.

• Developed high-quality applications utilizing **TypeScript**, **Node.js** (NestJS/Express), and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), resulting in a **20%** increase in system performance and scalability for financial platforms.
• Designed user-friendly interfaces with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to enhance user experience, achieving a **95%** satisfaction rate across customer feedback surveys.
• Delivered real-time analytics dashboards leveraging **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, improving decision-making processes through immediate insights into financial transactions and anomalies, reducing processing time by **40%**.
• Engineered a resilient event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to facilitate efficient asynchronous communication across financial workflows, including payments and compliance notifications.
• Constructed ETL pipelines for data ingestion from internal systems and third-party services employing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for both batch and real-time data processing, handling over **1 million** records daily.
• Developed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, successfully identifying suspicious activities with a detection accuracy of **98%** based on transactional patterns.
• Created machine learning pipelines for real-time applications such as credit scoring and churn prediction, utilizing **MLflow** and **Airflow** to seamlessly integrate model inference into backend services.

• Developed robust backend services with **Python** (using **FastAPI** and **Django**) and **Node.js** (incorporating **NestJS** and **Express.js**), ensuring high availability and scalability to support a global e-commerce platform.
• Enhanced systems integration using **RESTful API** and **GraphQL** to facilitate seamless data exchange and efficient API management across multiple services.
• Created dynamic web applications utilizing **TypeScript**, **React** (version **18**), and **Next.js**, ensuring fast, responsive user experiences through optimized coding practices and modern frameworks.
• Utilized **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL** for scalable data management solutions, ensuring effective and fast data handling for over **1 million** daily users.
• Crafted custom caching solutions and data storage strategies with **Redis** for improving performance and reducing database load during peak traffic events (achieving a **30%** reduction in latency).
• Collaborated with machine learning libraries such as **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to integrate GenAI-based recommendation systems, which increased conversion rates by **20%**.
• Implemented continuous delivery practices in a **DevOps** environment using **Kubernetes** for orchestrating applications and managing blue-green deployments, enhancing product release cycles.
• Conducted code reviews and mentoring sessions focusing on best practices in secure coding and performance optimization, contributing to team skill development and project success.
• Ensured strong security protocols using **OAuth 2.0** and role-based access control (RBAC), maintaining GDPR compliance throughout the development life cycle.
• Executed payment processing integrations using **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring PCI compliance and secure transactions for millions of users on the platform.
